duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for meeting all Quality Plan goals and maintaining product quality of manufactured construction and agricultural equipment.
Perform advanced analysis of warranty/quality data and implement effective containment and corrective actions.
Review engineering drawings, change notifications, and Salesforce cases for effective containment and corrective actions.
Gather data and input from a cross-functional team to revise quality control procedures for process and/or product improvements.
Coordinate and execute quality audits internally and externally of both process and finished product.
Lead teams in applying the Six Sigma DMAIC methodology to eliminate waste and drive continuous quality improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in quality, Business Management, Data Science, Engineering or related work experience.
Advanced training/experience in the use of statistical techniques and process improvement methods.
